quote: What drains your spirit drains your body. What fuels your spirit fuels your body.
author: Caroline Myss,  Anatomy of the Spirit

quote: The greater the spirit, the more one is alone.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: The spirit is one of the most neglected parts of man by doctors and scientists around the world. Yet, it is as vital to our health as the heart and mind. It's time for science to examine the many facets of the soul. The condition of our soul is usually the source of many sicknesses.
author: Suzy Kassem,  Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: Unrest of spirit is a mark of life.
author: Karl A. Menninger

quote: I was ripped from my body, I was less than spirit, less than the meanest ghost . . . but still, I was alive.
author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: Body and spirit, I surrendered whole, To harsh Instructors- and received a soul.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: The spirit of a man is constructed out of his choices.
author: Irvin D. Yalom,  When Nietzsche Wept

quote: Love and desire are the spirit's wings to great deeds.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: ...[M]y inner self moved; my spirit shook its always-fettered wings half loose. I had a sudden feeling as if I, who never yet truly lived, were at last about to taste life.
author: Charlotte Brontë,  Villette

quote: My soul doth magnify the Lord,And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour.
author: Mary (mother of Jesus),  Holy Bible: King James Version

quote: Ամբողջ մարմնի կենդանութիւնը հոգին է, իսկ մարմինն ու հոգին կառավարողը՝ միտքն է:The whole essence of the body is the spirit, while the governor of both spirit and body is the mind.
author: Saint Vardapet Eghishē

quote: The spirit of Christmas is the spirit of love and of generosity and of goodness. It illuminates the picture window of the soul, and we look out upon the world's busy life and become more interested in people than in things.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: How much truth does a spirit endure, how much truth does it dare?
author: Friedrich Nietzsche,  Ecce Homo

quote: We are spirits clad in veils.
author: Christopher Pearse Cranch

quote: All life is a manifestation of the spirit, the manifestation of love.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: I love the spirit of Halloween and the energy that comes with it.
author: Katharine McPhee

quote: You can drag my body to school but my spirit refuses to go.
author: Bill Watterson,  The Essential Calvin and Hobbes

quote: Where the spirit does not work with the hand, there is no art.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: I had been afraid of the awful presence of the river, which was the soul of the river, but through her [Ultima] I learned that my spirit shared in the spirit of all things.
author: Rudolfo Anaya,  Bless Me, Ultima

quote: Breath is your link to life; the direct connection to your spirit.
author: Dashama Konah Gordon,  Journey to Joyful: Transform Your Life with Pranashama Yoga

quote: A Woman in harmony with her spirit is like a river flowing.She goes where she will without pretense and arrives at her destination prepared to be herself and only herself
author: Maya Angelou

quote: First, I thought, almost despairing,This must crush my spirit now;Yet I bore it, and am bearing-Only do not ask me how.
author: Heinrich Heine

quote: To think what is true, to sense what is beautiful and to want what is good, hereby the spirit finds purpose of a life in reason.
author: Johann Gottfried Herder

quote: May my heart be kind, my mind fierce, and my spirit brave.
author: Kate Forsyth,  The Witches of Eileanan

quote: Well if God wanted a broken spirit out of me, He would get Hiswish. At this point in my life the only thing I could do was look up.
author: Michelle Sutton,  Never Without Hope

quote: The spirit and soul are the body and brain, which are destructible-that is precisely why they are so precious.
author: Ta-Nehisi Coates,  Between the World and Me

quote: The first rule is to keep an untroubled spirit. The second is to look things in the face and know them for what they are.
author: Marcus Aurelius,  Meditations

quote: The human spirit must prevail over technology.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Thinking: the talking of the soul with itself.
author: Plato

quote: Good heart, good soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Spiritual yearning is the homesickness of the soul.
author: Ma Jaya Sati Bhagavati,  The 11 Karmic Spaces: Choosing Freedom from the Patterns That Bind You

quote: It is the Holy Spirit's job to convict, God's job to judge and my job to love.
author: Billy Graham

quote: What art offers is space - a certain breathing room for the spirit.
author: John Updike

quote: I like the scientific spirit—the holding off, the being sure but not too sure, the willingness to surrender ideas when the evidence is against them: this is ultimately fine—it always keeps the way beyond open—always gives life, thought, affection, the whole man, a chance to try over again after a mistake—after a wrong guess.
author: Walt Whitman,  Walt Whitman's Camden Conversations

quote: Love ignites spiritual fire in the soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Soul inhabits body that fits.
author: Toba Beta,  My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: Again and again I will suffer; again and again I will get back on my feet. I will not be defeated. I won't let my spirit be destroyed.
author: Banana Yoshimoto,  Kitchen

quote: The authentic self is the soul made visible.
author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quote: The soul who does not live to give the best, deny the sacred self of full strength.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: When you do things from your soul, you feel a river moving in you, a joy.
author: Rumi

quote: The mind can calculate, but the spirit yearns, and the heart knows what the heart knows
author: Stephen King

quote: If I had a soul I sold itfor pretty wordsIf I had a body I usedit up spurting my essenceAllen Ginsberg warns youdont follow my pathto extinction
author: Allen Ginsberg

quote: A soul that becomes the place where divine grace is harbored and encouraged joins the class of the immortals and lives on into eternal greatness.
author: Garey Gordon,  The Values Pursued Life: Excellence and Greatness from Within

quote: And it is you, spirit--with will and energy, and virtue and purity--that I want, not alone with your brittle frame.
author: Charlotte Brontë,  Jane Eyre

quote: My spirit is healthy, yes. But I tell you, my flesh is healthy too. I am enlightened and free, but I am also lustful and carnal.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Great spirits have always encountered opposition from mediocre minds. The mediocre mind is incapable of understanding the man who refuses to bow blindly to conventional prejudices and chooses instead to express his opinions courageously and honestly.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: I have never seen a newspaper headline where those in spirit, without physical bodies, carried out evil deeds like a mugger in a parking lot.
author: Stephen Richards,  Cosmic Ordering Guide

quote: Believe God for something today. Prayer is the key to connecting with God and allowing Him to speak to your spirit. Open your heart and free your mind.
author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana,  Heart Crush

quote: My soul is in the sky.
author: William Shakespeare,  A Midsummer Night's Dream

quote: Wit is an explosion of the compound spirit.
author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel
